name: Maddening Mosquito
description:
Get blood from the man to stop yourself from dying without getting squished! 

Developed in free evenings in November for the GameOff 2021 game jam, keeping with the theme of bug! Game dev is a fun but small hobby for me, so the game is pretty simple, but I think its got some heart and challenge. All assets except for a couple of UI images are original. Hope you try it out and let me know what you think!
